item.description:
Join us as we return to one of the best restaurants on our tour of North End restaurants Piccolo Nido has delicious food and a great atmosphere.  We will also be doing a holiday ornament swap- so please bring a new holiday ornament with you (unwrapped) for the swap. Please be sure to bring a real ornament and not a modified toy or souvenir. After dinner, we will be head to the Living Room for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink. We look forward to seeing you for a fun night!

 

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. Please do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: North End Dinner & Holiday Ornament Swap: Picollo Nido Restaurant
